int arr[SIZE];
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    //int T;
   int T;
   ll N;
   ll K;
   cin>>T;
   while(T--)
   {
       cin>>N>>K;
       ll tot=(K*(K+1))/2;
       if(N>tot)
       {
           cout<<"-1"<<endl;
           continue;
       }
       if(N==tot)
       {
           cout<<"0"<<endl;
           continue;
       }
       if(N<=K)
       {
           cout<<K-1<<endl;
           continue;
       }
       ll curr=((K*(K+1))-2*N)*4+1;
       //curr=8*curr+1;
       double res=(double)(sqrt(curr));
       res=(res-1)/2;
       res=(floor)(res);
       cout<<res<<endl;
   }
    return 0;
}
